feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.29.30
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update packages/server to use new larger runners. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14329
  • docs(README): reference link by @guspan-tanadi in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14311
  • Updating google-spreadsheet version by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14320
  • Add Oracle to datasource.spec.ts. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14325
  • Fix tables showing up multiple times for Oracle in the datasource info endpoint. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14328
  • Support primitives in feature flags, make flag types flow, remove some obsolete feature flag systems. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14216
  • Add detailed tracing to searches. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14333

New Contributors

  • @guspan-tanadi made their first contribution in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14311

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.29...2.29.30

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • In-memory support for logical operators by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14331
  • Add search filter api validation by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14336
  • Support filtering views by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14335
  • SQL support for logical operators in search by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14316
  • Follow-up to Oracle fix PR by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14319

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.29.30...2.30.0

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.1

  • Add BpmStatusValue failed by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14334

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix AWS datasource when endpoint is unspecified by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14341

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.1...2.30.2

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 2.30.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: only use requirepass if password's set by @calexiou in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14345
  • Auto login the user after password is set by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14344
  • Assorted builder fixes and a fix for Google sheets filtering by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14315
  • Updating binaries to 2.0 for SQS by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14349
  • Fix for SQL composite key table _id search by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14350
  • Allow feature flags to be set via PostHog as well as by environment variables. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14337
  • Make it possible to get flag values from the license. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14353
  • [BUDI-8433] Default value column UI by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14204
  • Posthog logging by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14363
  • Disable PostHog feature flags in prod. by @samwho in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14364
  • Make generated passwords longer by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/14362

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/2.30.2...2.30.3
